brand.$description: Color used to express brand. Subject to theming. Use with caution!

base.$description: Loudest brand color. Currently reserved for header and tabs on public detail page.

contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of main-base.

base.$description: The second most prominent brand representation in the color scheme.

contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of alt-base.

highlight.$description: Brand accent color used for communicating active or focused state of interactive elements.

contrast.$description: Should pass AAA contrast check with the value of highlight-base.
